AgencyHero.title: Turn Your Tourism Business into an Online Powerhouse
AgencyHero.subtitle: We build professional, multilingual websites for Moroccan tour operators, riads, and local guides, designed to increase your direct bookings and grow your profits.

AgencyProblemSolution.problemTitle: Stop Losing Money to High Commissions.
AgencyProblemSolution.problemText: Are you tired of relying on international booking platforms that take a huge cut of your profits? Do you have an outdated website that doesn't attract customers? It's time to take back control of your business.
AgencyProblemSolution.solutionTitle: The Solution: Your Own Professional Website.
AgencyProblemSolution.solutionText: We provide you with a powerful, modern website complete with a full admin panel. You control your content, you manage your bookings, and most importantly, you keep 100% of your profits.

AgencyPortfolio.title: Our Flagship Product
AgencyPortfolio.subtitle: We've built a world-class, feature-rich tourism website template. This is the foundation we use to launch your professional online presence in record time.

AgencyFeatures.title: Packed with Professional Features
AgencyFeatures.coreSubtitle: Every website includes a powerful foundation built for success.
AgencyFeatures.pluginsSubtitle: Add powerful features as your business grows.

AgencyPricing.title: Simple, Transparent Packages
AgencyPricing.subtitle: Choose the package that's right for your business. No hidden fees, just pure value.
AgencyPricing.package1_desc: The perfect start for a professional online presence. Ideal for new businesses and local guides.
AgencyPricing.package1_note: *Includes a small 'Website by upmerce' link in the footer.
AgencyPricing.package2_desc: For established businesses looking to attract more customers and build a strong brand.
AgencyPricing.package3_desc: The ultimate solution to automate sales, capture leads, and maximize revenue.

AgencyContact.title: Ready to Grow Your Business?
AgencyContact.subtitle: Let's talk about your project. Contact me today for a free, no-obligation quote and a personalized demo.
